messages.subject: Foster kids
messages.msgSnippet: Hello all, Does anyone out there homeschool foster children? I am very open to being a foster parent, but don t know how I would handle schooling. I wouldn t
messages.messageBody:
Hello all,
Does anyone out there homeschool foster children? I am very open to
being a foster parent, but don't know how I would handle schooling. I
wouldn't want to send some to school and keep others at home, but I don't
know if I'd be allowed to hs foster kids. I won't send my son to school and
I'm afraid it would cause conflicts if we had other children who had to go.
The foster children might resent my son for not having to go, and even my
son might think he was missing something. Has anyone had any experience with
this? Any ideas?
Trisha
